title: Why Iraq Could Make or Break the Next Oil Price Move
summary: Last month, OPEC+ agreed to increase oil output from October by 137,000 barrels per day, a much lower clip compared to the 555,000 bpd increase announced for August and September and 411,000 bpd in June and July. That meant that the group has started unwinding the second tranche of 1.65 million bpd…

title: Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway Eyes Occidental's OxyChem in $10 Billion Deal
summary: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway - which we have been following and watching take, then increase its stake in Occidential Petroleum for years - has finally tipped its hand at what it's end game with the company could be. title: LNG Demand for Marine Fuel Set to Skyrocket by 2030
summary: Global LNG demand growth will be supported not only by higher power and gas consumption but also by surging demand from the shipping industry, where liquefied natural gas is poised to become key to replacing the dirtier fuel oil and other oil-based marine fuels. Demand for LNG bunkering is expected…
